articles.description: OXFORD UNIVERSITY and its partners, Swiss firm AstraZeneca, could roll out their vaccine as early as next week, as health workers prepare for another push amid a new deadly wave of Covid-19. How many doses will people need of the Oxford/AstraZeneca vaccine?

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: COVID-19: Boxing Day sales hit as Tier 4 closures push spending down - Sky News
articles.description: The pandemic continues to damage UK retail - and new government restrictions, introduced on Boxing Day, have added to the misery.
